WorkItem.Description:
I added two new stats for tanking cooldowns. One reduces the ICD of the cooldown by x% and the other increases the duration of the cooldown.
 
DefensiveCooldownDurationMultiplier
 
DefensiveCooldownReductionMultiplier
 
For example, Feral Druid's Frenzied Regeneration has a 3 minute cooldown and lasts for 20 seconds. The Boss handler will treat DefensiveCooldownDurationMultiplier with a 100% increase and DefensiveCooldownReductionMultiplier with 50% reduction. So in our example, the cooldown will be 1:30 and the duration will be 40 seconds long.
WorkItem.Summary: [Tank] Implement new 4.3 general Tank Cooldown stats
